p: Content analysis is not exempt from limitations. Most notably, this method is recurrently subject to a certain degree of subjectivity with regard to definitions and categorisations. However, this research attempted to overcome this issue by referring to consolidated scholarly and intergovernmental SD categories and interpretations. Due to the copious number of SDGs and vastity of the debated topics, this paper could only inspect goals and objectives directly dealing with microfinance and resilience. SDGs indirectly impacting microfinance and resilience were not considered.
